lines.text:
[jealous]
It seemed that you preferred his company over mine.
Nonsense. He is unsure if he will even start writing the first chapter of his next book. As a matter of fact, he makes me feel kind of motherly... which is something you never did!
Something's gone wrong. The band isn't playing "Hail to the Chief"!

[to Youngblood]
So, what should I call you? Youngy or Bloody?
Studying all of us for your next bestseller?

[to Youngblood, after a big-wig literary critic cracks a cruel joke]
The first rule is to always laugh at a joke made by Quentin Judd. He can make you... or break you. Shall we exit laughing?
Ladies and gentlemen, may the stag outrun the hounds!
You need somebody. And I wish it was me.
Kiss me, kiss me as only my wild hawk knows how!
I'm sick, you don't know how sick I am!
